title: Natural Remedies for ADHD
author: Mark Aumann
description: There's a lot of talk about natural remedies for ADHD. Find out which ones have science behind them.
cleaned_text: Natural Remedies for ADHD Natural Solutions? 1/11 Proven: Proven, Careful: Caffeine 5/11 Depends: Supplements and Vitamins 6/11 Not Enough Information: Herbal Medicines 7/11 Not Enough Information: Essential Oils 8/11 Not Enough Information: Biofeedback 9/11 Not Enough Information: Sensory Integration Training
